entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0141.9863] The filing reports values that use the including accrued interest items and the excluding accrued interest items. Review the accounting policy elections to determine if you should be using the excluding accrued interest items or the including accrued interest items.
Review the following elements including interest are appropriate given the majority of disclosure items are elements excluding interest: us-gaap:FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLosses.
The elements excluding interest are as follows: us-gaap:FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestYearOneOriginatedCurrentFiscalYear, us-gaap:FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestYearFourOriginatedThreeYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear, us-gaap:FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestOriginatedMoreThanFiveYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear, us-gaap:FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestYearTwoOriginatedFiscalYearBeforeCurrentFiscalYear, us-gaap:FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestYearThreeOriginatedTwoYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear, us-gaap:FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestYearFiveOriginatedFourYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear, us-gaap:FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestRevolving.
Period :2024-06-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:FinancingReceivablePortfolioSegmentAxis=srt:MultifamilyMember Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9863 Rule version: 26.0.9 - fmcc-20240630.htm 8

property.name: label
property.value: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0141.9863] The filing reports values that use the including accrued interest items and the excluding accrued interest items. Review the accounting policy elections to determine if you should be using the excluding accrued interest items or the including accrued interest items.
Review the following elements including interest are appropriate given the majority of disclosure items are elements excluding interest: us-gaap:FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLosses.
The elements excluding interest are as follows: us-gaap:FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestYearTwoOriginatedFiscalYearBeforeCurrentFiscalYear, us-gaap:FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestYearFourOriginatedThreeYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear, us-gaap:FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestYearOneOriginatedCurrentFiscalYear, us-gaap:FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestYearThreeOriginatedTwoYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear, us-gaap:FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestOriginatedMoreThanFiveYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear, us-gaap:FinancingReceivableExcludingAccruedInterestYearFiveOriginatedFourYearsBeforeCurrentFiscalYear.
Period :2024-06-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:FinancingReceivablePortfolioSegmentAxis=srt:SingleFamilyMember Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9863 Rule version: 26.0.9 - fmcc-20240630.htm 8

property.name: label
property.value: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
